===Etymology===
/ikkakuziu/ → /ikkakuzyuː/. Literally "single horned beast".

===Pronunciation===
* {{IPA|[ikkakudʑuː]|lang=ja}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|いっかくじゅう|hhira=いっかくじう|kyu=一角獸}}

# a mythical horse with a single horn; a [[unicorn]]
# {{lb|ja|rare}} a mythical chimera-like beast; a [[qilin]]
